section.title: Parse callbacks
section.para: Parse callbacks are invoked by yaml_parse, yaml_parse_file or yaml_parse_url functions when a registered YAML tag is encountered. The callback is passed the tagged entity's value, the tag, and flags indicating the scalar entity style. The callback must return the data that the YAML parser should emit for this entity.

section.title: Emit callbacks
section.para: Emit callbacks are invoked when an instance of a registered class is emitted by yaml_emit or yaml_emit_file. The callback is passed the object to be emitted. The callback must return an array having two keys: "tag" and "data". The value associated with the "tag" key must be a string to be used as the YAML tag in the output. The value associated with the "data" key will be encoded as YAML and emitted in place of the intercepted object.
